text:
Hey everyone!

Check out the link below for the latest news about the growing HubSpot app partner ecosystem — including an overview of the top 20 fastest growing apps this year, the PieSync acquisition, and more:

<http://bit.ly/hs-platform-update>

You spoke and we listened. We’re excited to announce a new academy course for working with HubSpot’s APIs. If you’re new to APIs or more specifically new to HubSpot’s APIs this will help you get started.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/announcement-new-api-focused-academy-modules-for-developers>
woohoo, MakeWebBetter - ecommerce connector is there as a risign star :tada::hamsterdance::partyparrot:
